content.raw:
I'm pushing a couple more checks just to be safe, but they will most likely not solve the issue.

Another thing to consider is that GTest may be doing something funky in between `TEST_F`s which is messing up the static variables from the second `TEST_F` onwards. We would still need to work around it, but it would mean that our code doesn't really have any problems, because things work during normal use.

The quickest workaround would be to disable the problematic tests on homebrew, the 2nd quickest would be to split tests into several files so that there's one `TEST_F` per file.

I still want to see a new homebrew failure report to check all the assumptions above before anything though - the old builds are gone and the current builds are broken because the ign-physics commit is outdated.

Another thing to consider is that GTest may be doing something funky in between TEST_Fs which is messing up the static variables from the second TEST_F onwards. We would still need to work around it, but it would mean that our code doesn't really have any problems, because things work during normal use.

The quickest workaround would be to disable the problematic tests on homebrew, the 2nd quickest would be to split tests into several files so that there's one TEST_F per file.

I still want to see a new homebrew failure report to check all the assumptions above before anything though - the old builds are gone and the current builds are broken because the ign-physics commit is outdated.
